attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we must disolve this government as the whole country is sick and tired of this completly rubbish and crippling bunch of loosers . i have to spell disolved incorrectly to be accepted.please join the backlash

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
